mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, author, contents, created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{contents}, now(), now(), 0, #{boardType}, #{travelDate})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, author, contents,created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date FROM board
SELECT id, title, author, contents, created_at, modified_at, hits, board_type, travel_date FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
